snippet: "The Lawgiver," a new novel by Herman Wouk, the 96-year-old Pulitzer Prize-winning author of "The Caine Mutiny," will tell the story of a group of people filming a movie in modern times about Moses.
abstract: "The Lawgiver," a new novel by Herman Wouk, the 96-year-old Pulitzer Prize-winning author of "The Caine Mutiny," will tell the story of a group of people filming a movie in modern times about Moses.

headline.main: New Herman Wouk Novel, 'The Lawgiver,' Coming From Simon & Schuster
headline.print_headline: Herman Wouk, at 96, Has a New Novel
